title: Heartbeat 2
body:
Am
I know you told
So many times
Am
So many words
In different rhymes
   Dm        C        G
But I don’t feel the same

Am
I wasn’t innocent, I know
Am
And things I did for sure were wrong
   Dm         C         G
The time has passed so long

            Am
Feeling your heartbeat
             C
That's what I want
             G
That's what I need
                                       Am
Feeling again that you're breathing with me

Am
I’m getting wild when I’m alone
Am
I learned by heart you're not my own
   D       C                Am
But I never asked you to be long

Am
Your my desire and my pain
Am
But all the battles are in vain
   D        C                G
You mean more than anything to me

            Am
Feeling your heartbeat
             C
That's what I want
             G
That's what I need
                                        Am
Feeling again that you're breathing with me

             Am
Feeling your heartbeat
             C
That's what I want
             G
That's what I need
                                        Am
Feeling again that you're breathing with me

F
You’re the one I need
          Am
You’re the air that I breathe
C
Don’t throw my heart away
             G
I want you to stay

            Am
Feeling your heartbeat
             C
That's what I want
             G
That's what I need
                                        Am
Feeling again that you're breathing with me

            Am
Feeling your heartbeat
             C
That's what I want
             G
That's what I need
                                        Am
Feeling again that you're breathing with me

bodyLyrics:
I know you told
So many times
So many words
In different rhymes
But I don’t feel the same

I wasn’t innocent, I know
And things I did for sure were wrong
The time has passed so long

Feeling your heartbeat
That's what I want
That's what I need
Feeling again that you're breathing with me

I’m getting wild when I’m alone
I learned by heart you're not my own
But I never asked you to be long

Your my desire and my pain
But all the battles are in vain
You mean more than anything to me

Feeling your heartbeat
That's what I want
That's what I need
Feeling again that you're breathing with me

Feeling your heartbeat
That's what I want
That's what I need
Feeling again that you're breathing with me

You’re the one I need
You’re the air that I breathe
Don’t throw my heart away
I want you to stay

Feeling your heartbeat
That's what I want
That's what I need
Feeling again that you're breathing with me

Feeling your heartbeat
That's what I want
That's what I need
Feeling again that you're breathing with me
Feeling your heartbeat
